EmailTemplate.subject: New Features For Your Online Ordering - Action Required
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Online Ordering is getting a whole lot cooler in 7 days... Great news! As an Aloha Online Ordering user, we’re transitioning you to our new Digital Ordering platform on March 31st. It’s easier to manage your site, and making updates is effortless. Plus, consumers love the new look! You’ll get all these awesome features and more: - Brand and Menu Customization – Easily customize your online ordering site with your colors and fonts in seconds and upload images of your food to feature all your culinary creations. - Offer Delivery and Own Your Customer – Integrate your online ordering with Drive powered by DoorDash and keep your customers ordering through your digital channel. - Responsive Design – Guests get the same experience whether they’re placing orders on their phone, a tablet, or a computer. Let's get ready to roll Your Digital Ordering site will have a fresh look after the migration on March 31'st, and you must take a few actions to get ready. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Any questions?
